1010100111111101 1100001000111010 1 -> sum: 0110110000111000, cout: 1
0111010111011001 0001000011110010 1 -> sum: 1000011011001100, cout: 0
1110000011111110 0011110011101111 0 -> sum: 0001110111101101, cout: 1
0101110001010110 0101101000100101 1 -> sum: 1011011001111100, cout: 0
1110001111110000 1100101110000111 1 -> sum: 1010111101111000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
